article: Being content with yourself and optimistic about your future is not difficult. Whatever is in thepast is _ .Learn from it and move on. When you are _ enough to do this, you will see thatmoving ahead is the best definition of living _ . What can you do now? Sure it is _ for me to tell you to forget the past, _ it is a whole _ to actually do it. Life is a complex set of events, much of which _ is real, but a large amountis just your _ of what really happened. Let me _ with an example. I know not everyone is a football fan, but I am _ most have watched at least _ of a game on TV. Most games and almost all the important games are _ overand over on the TV screen right after the game happened. When you watched a game, you were _ of the outcome, saying the player _ the ball. Then whilewatching the instant replay, you realized you were _ wrong. The player dropped the pass. What youwere certain of never happened. In order to _ on your future, you should try to minimize the effects of your past. Try to find out how much of the past that you are certain are just _ . For example, as a teenager, you tried to build a piece of furniture in your father"s workshop. The piece of furniture looked _ when you finished, butit fell apart before you could _ it to your father. The reality was that the wood you used was faulty. It was not your building ability. So don"t think yourself to be a _ carpenter and avoid buildinganything. Forget the past and move on.
